name: The Fear Of Striking Out
description:
"Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game." -Babe Ruth

This game was made in 3 hours (In separated sessions) for the Tri-Jam 174. The planning, concept, and itch.io page was done outside of the 3 hour time limit.

Theme: A game based on a quote

Controls:

  • A & D to Move
  • Space to Jump

Credits

  • Palette Used: Fleja Master Palette by Fleja
  • Music Used: Clair De Lune by Debussy
  • Font Used: Retro Gaming by Daymarius
